title: register new user with valid data
description: Test the /api/register endpoint to ensure a new user can be registered successfully with valid name, email, and password, returning HTTP 201.

title: login user with correct credentials
description: Test the /api/login endpoint to verify that a user can log in successfully with valid email and password, returning HTTP 200 and an authentication token.

title: logout authenticated user
description: Test the /api/auth/logout endpoint to ensure an authenticated user can log out successfully, invalidating the token and returning HTTP 200.

title: list all products with pagination
description: Test the /api/products GET endpoint to retrieve a paginated list of products, verifying the response structure and HTTP 200 status.

title: create new product with valid data
description: Test the /api/products POST endpoint to create a new product with valid name, price, stock, and optional category_id, ensuring HTTP 201 response.

title: search products by query string
description: Test the /api/products/search GET endpoint to search products by a query string parameter 'q', verifying the search results and HTTP 200 response.

title: add item to cart with valid product and quantity
description: Test the /api/cart POST endpoint to add an item to the shopping cart with valid product_id and quantity, ensuring inventory validation and HTTP 201 response.

title: process checkout with valid shipping and payment details
description: Test the /api/checkout POST endpoint to process checkout with complete shipping information and supported payment methods, verifying order creation and HTTP 201 response.

title: list user orders
description: Test the /api/orders GET endpoint to retrieve a list of orders for the authenticated user, verifying order details and HTTP 200 response.

title: handle paymob payment webhook
description: Test the /api/paymob/webhook POST endpoint to handle Paymob payment gateway webhook events, verifying correct processing and HTTP 200 response for valid webhooks.
